title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to any local Ollama model; supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI (terminal UI) for browsing, chatting with, and managing Ollama models from the command line.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with your PDFs entirely offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; Spring Boot starters included.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and Unity; async streaming out of the box.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Chroma, and open-source embedding models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside notes using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin for AI-assisted block generation and summarization powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go SDK for Ollama with streaming chat, embeddings, and model management; includes Gin example server.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for the Ollama JavaScript client (mirror of ollama-js repo).

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python client (mirror of ollama-python repo).

title: r/ollama – Local LLM Ecosystem Discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing new tools, model tips, and integrations around Ollama.
